mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room_info (title, filename, filepath, meet_Date, meet_place, meet_place_road, notice, category, writer, user_limit, user_cnt) VALUES (#{title}, #{filename}, #{filepath}, #{meet_Date}, #{meet_place}, #{meet_place_road}, #{notice}, #{category}, #{writer}, #{user_limit}, #{user_cnt})
mapper.select: SELECT bno, title, filename, filepath, meet_Date, meet_place, meet_place_road, notice, category, writer, user_limit, user_cnt FROM room_info ORDER BY writer ASC;
SELECT bno, title, filename, filepath, meet_Date, meet_place, meet_place_road, notice, category, writer, user_limit, user_cnt FROM room_info ORDER BY writer ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT bno, title, filename, filepath, meet_Date, meet_place, meet_place_road, notice, category, writer, user_limit, user_cnt FROM room_info WHERE category = #{category}
SELECT bno, title, filename, filepath, meet_Date, meet_place, meet_place_road, notice, category, writer, user_limit, user_cnt FROM room_info WHERE bno = #{bno}
SELECT bno, title, filename, filepath, meet_Date, meet_place, meet_place_road, notice, category, writer, user_limit, user_cnt FROM room_info WHERE writer = #{writer}
